function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Insufficient comprehensive surveillance of the environment through air and water","Impact":"Unidentified sources of COVID-19 transmission leading to uncontrolled spread","Mitigation":"Implementing comprehensive surveillance measures to monitor air and water for COVID-19 presence","Technologies":"Rapid ELISA/biosensors/Paper-based tests for screening","People":"General population, public health officials","Owner":"Public health agencies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Lack of rapid and on-site detection of COVID-19 in sewage waters and humans","Impact":"Delay in detecting and managing outbreaks, leading to increased transmission","Mitigation":"Development and deployment of paper-based testing devices for rapid detection","Technologies":"Paper-based tests, optomechanical spectrometry detection","People":"Public health officials, researchers","Owner":"Research groups, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Reliance on assumptions for modeling daily excretion rates in human stool samples","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of COVID-19 transmission through wastewater-based epidemiology (WBE)","Mitigation":"Validating and refining the modeling assumptions with real-world data","Technologies":"Theoretical computational analysis, wastewater sampling and analysis","People":"Researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies"}]}
